document_data.caption: The River Rauthenflow and the surroundign area.
document_data.name: River Rauthenflow
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Rauthenflow''' was a waterway in northern [[Mulhorand]] known for possessing an exceptionally fast current.The bold heading on page 15 of the first edition of [[Old Empires]] reads ''River Rauthengflow'', while the rest of the source spells the river, ''Rauthenflow''. The Rauthenflow connected [[Brightstar Lake|Gbor Nor]] in the [[Hordelands]] with the [[Alamber Sea]].

Geography.Falls:
; [[Rauthgor]]
:These falls, located near the mouth of the River Rauthenflow, were considered one of the most spectacular sites in [[Faer没n]].

document_data.Inhabitants: The area surrounding the River Rauthenflow was inhospitable to most habitation. Despite this, various monsters called this region home. The falls of Rauthgor were known to be frequented by a notable population of [[mermaid]]s.
document_data.History:
The entire length of the river was navigable due to efforts from the ancient empires of Mulhorand and [[Imaskar]]. These massive projects added canals around cataracts, fortified the soft banks with stone, and cleared rapids of large rocks.

The Rauthenflow was a vital source of income for [[Murgh么m]] since they applied a tax to any vessel sailing its waters.

Due to the high volume of river traffic, pirates were virtually unheard of on the Rauthenflow.

Notable locations.Settlements:
; [[Rauthil]]
:This settlement boasted a bridge recognized as the only crossing of the River Rauthenflow.
